a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (10:58): no google+ here either!
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (10:58): that's the one with the sign?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (10:59): unfortunately they moved the shop and they don't have that sign where anybody can lay down in front of it any more

d6e292711389fc8c3d399cd640fc8a40 (11:00): we'll get a html5 gang sign pic in front of that thing one day

d6e292711389fc8c3d399cd640fc8a40 (11:04): Not planned to be in tokyo for a while‚Ä¶ but I'm really yearning to return
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:06): wow. a longish thread about the meaning of <foo/> in HTML4 on www-validator. again. still. in 2011.
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (11:08): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: I would feel sorry for you if that wasn't so funny
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (11:12): guesses http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/www-validator/2011Nov/0007.html
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:12): yeah
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:12): glad I skipped that one :)
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:13): wonderfully intuitive "NET-enabling start-tag requires SHORTTAG YES" message the validator emits there
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (11:13): is glad that we have start tags to enable the net
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:14): we need more specs like SGML
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (11:21): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: especially nice that the validator has stepped away from spec purity since html4's sgml decl says SHORTTAG YES
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (11:21): but still has confusing messages
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:22): it still clings to spec purity in other ways
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:22): like, reporting id=foo and id=FOO and duplicated IDs
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:22): and not reporting e.g.,  <p right> as an error
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:23): the SGML neckbeards were in a league of their own
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:24): in other news, great entertainment value in Murata-san's bugzilla comments
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:25): or should i say "comment"
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:25): cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0: you found the right thread
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:25): because it's the same one he's made several times now
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:25): www-validator is a pot of gold
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (11:26): most of the thread seems to discuss how to improve the message that says that the slash causes other confusing messages to be emitted
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (11:26): instead of, i dunno, removing the confusing messages and emitting one unconfusing message
